verses.verse: The Spirit<WH7307> of the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> is on me; because<WH3282> the LORD<WH3068> has anointed<WH4886> me to preach<WH1319> good<WH1319> tidings<WH1319> to the meek;<WH6035> he has sent<WH7971> me to bind<WH2280> up the brokenhearted,<WH7665> <WH3820> to proclaim<WH7121> liberty<WH1865> to the captives,<WH7628> and the opening<WH6495> of the prison<WH6495> to them that are bound;<WH631>
To proclaim<WH7121> the acceptable<WH7522> year<WH8141> of the LORD,<WH3068> and the day<WH3117> of vengeance<WH5359> of our God;<WH430> to comfort<WH5162> all<WH3605> that mourn;<WH57>

To appoint<WH7760> to them that mourn<WH57> in Zion,<WH6726> to give<WH5414> to them beauty<WH6287> for ashes,<WH665> the oil<WH8081> of joy<WH8342> for mourning,<WH60> the garment<WH4594> of praise<WH8416> for the spirit<WH7307> of heaviness;<WH3544> that they might be called<WH7121> trees<WH352> of righteousness,<WH6664> the planting<WH4302> of the LORD,<WH3068> that he might be glorified.<WH6286>

And they shall build<WH1129> the old<WH5769> wastes,<WH2723> they shall raise<WH6965> up the former<WH7223> desolations,<WH8074> and they shall repair<WH2318> the waste<WH2721> cities,<WH5892> the desolations<WH8074> of many generations.<WH1755>
And strangers<WH2114> shall stand<WH5975> and feed<WH7462> your flocks,<WH6629> and the sons<WH1121> of the alien<WH5236> shall be your plowmen<WH406> and your vinedressers.<WH3755>

But you shall be named<WH7121> the Priests<WH3548> of the LORD:<WH3068> men shall call<WH7121> you the Ministers<WH8334> of our God:<WH430> you shall eat<WH398> the riches<WH2428> of the Gentiles,<WH1471> and in their glory<WH3519> shall you boast<WH3235> yourselves.

For your shame<WH1322> you shall have double;<WH4932> and for confusion<WH3639> they shall rejoice<WH7442> in their portion:<WH2506> therefore<WH3651> in their land<WH776> they shall possess<WH3423> the double:<WH4932> everlasting<WH5769> joy<WH8057> shall be to them.

For I the LORD<WH3068> love<WH157> judgment,<WH4941> I hate<WH8130> robbery<WH1498> for burnt<WH5930> offering; and I will direct<WH5414> their work<WH6468> in truth,<WH571> and I will make<WH3772> an everlasting<WH5769> covenant<WH1285> with them.

And their seed<WH2233> shall be known<WH3045> among the Gentiles,<WH1471> and their offspring<WH6631> among<WH8432> the people:<WH5971> all<WH3605> that see<WH7200> them shall acknowledge<WH5234> them, that they are the seed<WH2233> which the LORD<WH3068> has blessed.<WH1288>

I will greatly rejoice<WH7797> in the LORD,<WH3068> my soul<WH5315> shall be joyful<WH1523> in my God;<WH430> for he has clothed<WH3847> me with the garments<WH899> of salvation,<WH3468> he has covered<WH3271> me with the robe<WH4598> of righteousness,<WH6666> as a bridegroom<WH2860> decks<WH3547> himself with ornaments,<WH6287> and as a bride<WH3618> adorns<WH5710> herself with her jewels.<WH3627>

For as the earth<WH776> brings<WH3318> forth<WH3318> her bud,<WH6779> and as the garden<WH1593> causes the things that are sown<WH2221> in it to spring<WH6779> forth; so<WH3651> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> will cause righteousness<WH6666> and praise<WH8416> to spring<WH6779> forth before<WH5048> all<WH3605> the nations.<WH1471>
